amendatorysection.para: The task force shall conduct a review of the plans, specifications, and other construction and repair documents and ongoing maintenance requirements for real property that may be proposed to be made available to any state agency by means of gift and any acquisition of real property by any state agency using gifts of money pursuant to section 81-1,113. The task force shall submit a report of its findings and recommendations to the Committee on Building Maintenance. For purposes of this section, the terms gift and state agency have the same meanings as in section 81-1,111.
